total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows in the input grid that are completely filled with 1s.
Q2: Change all the 1s in the rows identified in Q1 to 2s.
Q3: Identify the rows in the input grid that are filled with 1s and 8s, with 8s on both ends.
Q4: Change all the 1s in the rows identified in Q3 to 2s.
Q5: Identify the rows in the input grid that are filled with 1s and 8s, with 1s on both ends.
Q6: Change all the 8s in the rows identified in Q5 to 2s.
Q1: Identify the rows in the input grid that are entirely filled with 1s or 8s.
Q2: For the rows identified in Q1, change all 1s to 2s.
Q3: Identify the rows in the input grid that have 1s and 8s.
Q4: For the rows identified in Q3, change the 1s to 2s only if they are surrounded by 8s on both sides.
Q1: Identify the rows in the input grid that are completely filled with 1s.
Q2: Change all the 1s in the rows identified in Q1 to 2s.
Q3: Identify the rows in the input grid that are filled with 1s and 8s, with 8s on both ends.
Q4: Change all the 1s in the rows identified in Q3 to 2s.
Q5: Identify the rows in the input grid that are filled with 1s and 8s, with 1s on both ends.
Q6: Change all the 8s in the rows identified in Q5 to 2s.
select_new_ys: Q1: Identify the rows in the input grid that are entirely filled with 1s or 8s.
Q2: For the rows identified in Q1, change all 1s to 2s.
Q3: Identify the rows in the input grid that have 1s and 8s.
Q4: For the rows identified in Q3, change the 1s to 2s only if they are surrounded by 8s on both sides.
